full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MDOS KYI MCHOD CHEN NYI SHU RTZA LNGA'I ZHUS LAN BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA MA MO SRID PA'I PA'I BEM GYI MDOS BRGYUD LAS BYUNG BA'I MDOS KYI CHA LAG MCHOD CHEN NYER LNGA RDZOGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,` 'DIR SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA GA R'A'I THUGS KYI NYING KHU MDOS CHOG SNA TSOGS PA LTO, ,SGRO SA MA YA BSGYUR CHEN DKA' BA'I LHANG MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
